q: Kya yahan test ride milti hai?
a: Haan! WhatsApp par message bhejiye aur timing lock kar dijiye. Test ride aapke pasand ke model par hogi.
Ji haan, free first service (labour). Parts/consumables extra ho sakte hain as per job card.
Haan. Basic KYC aur down payment ke saath easy EMI plans available hain.
NH-28, Teghra Chowk, Begusarai, Bihar-851133. Google Maps par 'Tahalka TVS' search kijiye.
